1599410.name: Mauled
1599410.description:
Mauled is an indie Third-Person Shooter that blends arcade action with tactical cooperation. Battle through diverse environments against brutal monster waves using a mix of firearms, activatable traps, and purchasable upgrades. Whether playing solo or in online Co-op, prepare for a scaling challenge that will test your reflexes to the limit.


Game Features

  • Survive endless waves of monsters emerging from dimensional portals in a high-stakes battle for survival.

  • Solo or Co-op: Play solo or team up with friends for a fast-paced, seamless online cooperative experience.

  • Strategic Citadels: Visit Citadels to purchase new weapons, activate tactical traps, and unlock character improvements.

  • Expanded arsenal: Discover and wield a wide variety of weapons, ranging from common tiers to powerful legendary finds.

  • Environmental Hazards: Turn the tide of battle by triggering map-based traps to wipe out entire hordes at once.

  • Epic Boss Encounters: Face intense periodic boss battles, each accompanied by a unique and immersive soundtrack..

Story

The fabric of reality has fractured. Dimensional portals now scar the landscape, bleeding endless waves of monstrous entities into a world on the brink of total collapse. As one of the last defenders standing, you are the only barrier between survival and extinction. Your mission is simple but suicide: contain the invasion, face the escalating horrors, and hold the line against the darkness. With every wave, the threat grows stronger and the portals yield more terrifying secrets. How many rounds can you endure before the void finally claims what remains?

About Elements Studio

Mauled is a passion project developed entirely by a solo developer dedicated to creating an evolving and visceral combat experience. Being a one-man team allows me to stay deeply connected to the game’s vision and its players. I am fully committed to delivering regular updates, refining the gameplay loop, and expanding the world of Mauled based directly on community feedback and player experiences.

Join the Community on Discord

Stay connected with the development process! Join our Discord to share your feedback, report bugs, and help shape the future of the game. Your input is vital to the journey of this indie project.

Download Mauled now and dive straight into the action!
